references.paper_title: 3dmatch: Learning local geometric descriptors from rgb-d reconstructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a widely used benchmark dataset for 3D point cloud registration, providing a foundation for evaluating the performance of various methods.

references.paper_title: Cofinet: Reliable coarse-to-fine correspondences for robust point cloud registration
references.reason: This paper proposes a coarse-to-fine framework for point cloud registration, which is a common approach and influenced the design of the current method.

references.paper_title: GeoTransformer: Fast and robust point cloud registration with geometric transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces a transformer-based approach for point cloud registration achieving state-of-the-art results, influencing the architecture and methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: D3feat: Joint learning of dense detection and description of 3d local features
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for learning dense 3D features, which are commonly used in point cloud registration and directly inspired the design of the feature extraction module.

This paper introduces fully convolutional geometric features, demonstrating the effectiveness of learning-based methods for feature extraction in point cloud registration and influencing the design choices in the current work.
